scraper module¶

Copyright (C) 2021 SE Slash - All Rights Reserved You may use, distribute and modify this code under the terms of the MIT license. You should have received a copy of the MIT license with this file. If not, please write to: secheaper@gmail.com

scraper.condense_helper(result_condensed, list, num)¶

This is a helper function to limit number of entries in the result

scraper.driver(product, currency, num=None, df_flag=0, csv=False, cd=None, ui=False, sort=None)¶

Returns csv is the user enters the –csv arg, else will display the result table in the terminal based on the args entered by the user

scraper.httpsGet(URL)¶

The httpsGet function makes HTTP called to the requested URL with custom headers

scraper.searchAmazon(query, df_flag, currency)¶

The searchAmazon function scrapes amazon.com Parameters: query- search query for the product, df_flag- flag variable, currency- currency type entered by the user Returns a list of items available on Amazon.com that match the product entered by the user.

scraper.searchBJs(query, df_flag, currency)¶

The searchBJs function scrapes https://www.bjs.com/ Parameters: query- search query for the product, df_flag- flag variable, currency- currency type entered by the user Returns a list of items available on walmart.com that match the product entered by the user

scraper.searchEtsy(query, df_flag, currency)¶

The searchEtsy function scrapes Etsy.com Parameters: query- search query for the product, df_flag- flag variable, currency- currency type entered by the user Returns a list of items available on Etsy.com that match the product entered by the user

scraper.searchGoogleShopping(query, df_flag, currency)¶

The searchGoogleShopping function scrapes https://shopping.google.com/ Parameters: query- search query for the product, df_flag- flag variable, currency- currency type entered by the user Returns a list of items available on walmart.com that match the product entered by the user

scraper.searchWalmart(query, df_flag, currency)¶

The searchWalmart function scrapes walmart.com Parameters: query- search query for the product, df_flag- flag variable, currency- currency type entered by the user Returns a list of items available on walmart.com that match the product entered by the user
